name: spearman_correlation_from_database
description: Perform Spearman rank correlation test between two numeric columns from a SQLite database.

database_path.description: Path to the SQLite database file.

from_clause.description: SQL FROM clause (table name or JOIN expression).

where_clause.description: Optional SQL WHERE clause (without the 'WHERE' keyword).

where_params.description: Optional list of parameters to inject into the WHERE clause.

drop_na.description: Whether to drop rows with missing values.
